metadata.name: Sepas Dream
metadata.description:
Every day can be a new birthday.  
Like a star's birth and the start of shining light, A blossom's birth and adding beauty to a tree, A butterfly's birth and flying over the flowers, A hope's birth in a world's heart from hopelessness. Or for me, Every time I feel happiness from the bottom of my heart, Every time I continue on my path after a tough defeat, Every time I touch love, Or even when I reminisce with bitter memories.  
Now that I think more, Every time I loved someone and gave them joy, Or every time I shared someone's sad moments, even when I forgave people for their mistakes, I created a new birth for myself.  
All those moments made me feel good.  
Every time I made myself happy and experienced these feelings, that was my birth. But today is different.  
The day I came to this world to create good moments for myself and others.  
So, HAPPY BIRTHDAY to me jon.

Physical Painting
